member.name: POLICY_ACCOUNT_DOMAIN_INFO
member.summary: The POLICY_ACCOUNT_DOMAIN_INFO structure is used to set and query the name and SID of the system's account domain. The and functions use this structure when their InformationClass parameters are set to PolicyAccountDomainInformation.

member.name: POLICY_ACCOUNT_DOMAIN_INFO.DomainName
member.summary: An structure that specifies the name of the account domain.

member.name: POLICY_ACCOUNT_DOMAIN_INFO.DomainSid
member.summary: Pointer to the SID of the account domain.
